chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 mini has the above problem:

The iPhone is not in a great condition from the outside. The screen and back have some scratches. The frame also has various damages of different depth and size.

I would still be interested in this model. Would you send me another iPhone 13 mini with 128GB at midnight?

Thank you for your help,

If the sellers receive the package, they have 3 working days (5 working days for laptops and household appliances) to repair or replace the product. To request a refund if necessary, they have 2 working days.

The customer or customer has fulfilled the following requirements for a successful return:
✔ They have confirmed that the device has not been opened by a third party nor damaged (through drop or water exposure).
✔ They have confirmed all personal data removed from the device.
✔ Confirmed that the return label arrived.
✔ Knows that the whole packaging and receipt must be attached to the package.
✔ Knows that the return label is valid for 14 days.

Don't forget: As soon as the package arrives, sellers have 3 working days (5 working days for laptops and household appliances) to repair or replace the product, or 2 working days to settle the amount.

Hello ecomobile,

You have received the product for repair, the 30/05/2024. The delay to repair or exchange the product is 3 days for technical issue. Without an answer with a valid tracking link before the 05/06/2024 we will refund the customer.

Thank you for understanding,
Diogo from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, our repair team is unable to fix the issue and we have insufficient stock for exchange. Instead, we have processed the full refund. Thank you for your understanding.

Regards,
JY
